about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: The Story of SUST Fitness Club
about.description: SUST Fitness Club was established in 2018 with the aim of increasing health awareness and providing fitness training to the students of Shahjalal University of Science and Technology. Our goal is to help every member reach their fitness goals.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To help every student of the university stay healthy and fit.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be established as the best university fitness club in Bangladesh.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about SUST Fitness Club

items.question: Who can join SUST Fitness Club?
items.answer: SUST Fitness Club is open to all current students, faculty members, and staff of Shahjalal University of Science and Technology. You need a valid university ID to register.

items.question: Is membership free for students?
items.answer: Yes! Membership is completely free for all SUST students. We believe fitness should be accessible to everyone in our university community.

items.question: How do I register for membership?
items.answer: You can register online through our website or visit our office at the gymnasium building. Bring your student ID and a passport-sized photo for registration.

items.question: What equipment is available at the gym?
items.answer: Our gym is equipped with treadmills, exercise bikes, rowing machines, free weights (dumbbells and barbells), weight machines, yoga mats, and stretching areas.

items.question: What are the gym operating hours?
items.answer: The gym is open from 6:00 AM to 10:00 PM on weekdays and 7:00 AM to 8:00 PM on weekends. We are closed on public holidays.

items.question: Are there separate sessions for male and female members?
items.answer: Yes, we have dedicated time slots for female members. Morning 6:00-8:00 AM and evening 4:00-6:00 PM are reserved exclusively for female members.

items.question: Do you provide personal training?
items.answer: Yes, we offer personal training sessions with our certified trainers. You can book sessions based on your schedule and fitness goals.

items.question: What types of group classes are available?
items.answer: We offer various group classes including Yoga, Zumba, CrossFit, HIIT, and Aerobics. Check our schedule for class timings and availability.

items.question: Can beginners join the training programs?
items.answer: Absolutely! Our programs are designed for all fitness levels. Our trainers will create a personalized plan based on your current fitness level and goals.

items.question: What should I bring to the gym?
items.answer: Bring comfortable workout clothes, sports shoes, a water bottle, and a small towel. Lockers are available for storing your belongings.

items.question: Is there a nutrition counseling service?
items.answer: Yes, we provide basic nutrition guidance as part of our membership. For detailed diet plans, our trainers can help you create a personalized nutrition plan.

items.question: How can I participate in fitness competitions?
items.answer: We organize inter-departmental and university-level fitness competitions throughout the year. Members are notified about upcoming events through our social media and notice board.

contact.title: Still have questions?
contact.description: Can't find the answer you're looking for? Please contact our support team.
